title: Physical education at Crows Nest, Queenscliff
creator_credit: Owen Brothers Animated Films, Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development and E.J. Perry
brief_description: A Victorian Education Department film detailing the physical education camp at Queenscliff for student teachers from the Ballarat, Bendigo and Melbourne Teacher’s Colleges. The student teachers learnt games, folk dancing and limited gymnastics. Commentary by Lloyd Williams.
creator_credit_for_label: Owen Brothers Animated Films, Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development and E.J. Perry
